articles.title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare's Enormous Patch Size Annoys Players - GameSpot
articles.description: With another large update this week, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's file size is approaching half that of standard console hard drives.

articles.title: TrendForce says that total smartphone production might drop to 16.5% - Micky News
articles.description: A TrendForce research forecasts a huge drop of 16.5% in total smartphone production in the June quarter of 2020.
articles.content:
The problem lies on the reduced purchasing capacity of consumer brought about by the Coronavirus pandemic. The global data of smartphone usage will see a huge uptick between the first six months of the year.
